page.title: 04A SUNDAY IN TWEEDBANK
page.content: My name is{Cara}Barnes.On Sunday I get up and go for a wash.We have our breakfast then I usually take the dog for a walk.These past few Sundays I have been going to dance practice for the Tweedbank Fair.In Blakehope Court there is a swing in Crow-wood, so named because so many crows live there.In Blakehope Court there are many houses of many shapes and sizes.On Sundays my family and I sometimes go to visit my older sisters.When I am not visiting I usually play with my friend Louise Smith at Lowood House where there is a big wood.On Sunday I often take my dog,Jake,for a long walk from my house in Tweedbank to Melrose,only two miles away.
